casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 1, 2014

[Cite as 0510112014 Case Announcements #2, 2014-Ohio-1853.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1292. State ex rel. Doner v. Zehringer.

In Mandamus. This cause came on for further consideration upon the filing of relators’ cross-motion for leave to file supplement to evidence.

It is ordered by the court that respondents shall file a response, if any, to the motion no later than 12:00 p.m. on Friday, May 2, 2014.
